== Description ==

Displays the text of a comment formatted for [[Glossary#RSS|RSS]]. Typically used in the RSS comment feed template. This tag must be within [[The Loop]], or a comment loop.

== Usage ==

%%% <?php comment_text_rss(); ?> %%%

== Example ==

 <description><?php comment_text_rss() ?></description>

== Parameters ==

This tag has no parameters.

== Filters ==

[[Function Reference/apply_filters|apply_filters()]] Calls 'comment_text_rss' filter on comment content.
